section.title: Description
section.paragraph: This element defines the RGB values used in mIRC's internal 16 color palette.
This element is optional and may appear one or more times per scheme.

section.title: Data
section.paragraph: An RGB value in 'R,G,B' or 'RGB' (long format) format.

section.title: Engine Requirements
section.paragraph: If a list of values has been specified in the 'list' attribute of the 'palette' element, the engine should apply the list first, then apply the individual 'rgb' elements.
If an RGB value has not been specified. either as part of a list or individually, the engine should revert it to the "mIRC Classic" (default) color.
